output: html_document
runtime: shiny

```{r context=setup}
library(shiny)
library(shinyjs)
```

# Minimal example

```{r}
shinyjs::useShinyjs(rmd=TRUE) # newly added
checkboxInput("all", label = "Select all ", value = FALSE)
selectInput("system", "Options:", choices = c("1", "2"))
```


```{r, context=server}
observeEvent(input$all, {
    if(input$all == T) {
      shinyjs::disable('system') 
    } else {
      shinyjs::enable('system')
    }
  }, ignoreNULL = T)
```
